snippet.title: NORCO | Announcement Teaser | WISHLIST TODAY
snippet.description:
Wishlist NORCO on Steam TODAY: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1221250/NORCO  

NORCO is a sci-fi Southern Gothic point and click adventure that explores the industrial swamplands and decaying suburbs of South Louisiana. 

NORCO immerses the player in the sinking suburbs and verdant industrial swamps of Louisiana's petrochemical hinterlands. Your brother Blake has gone missing in the aftermath of your mother’s death. In the hopes of finding him, you must follow a fugitive security cyborg through the refineries, strip malls, and drainage ditches of suburban New Orleans. 

Geography of Robots 
Geography of Robots is a video game collaborative that explores the hidden geographies, conspiracies, folklore, and ecology of the American Deep South. 

Webpage: https://geographyofrobots.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/roboticgeo 

Raw Fury 
Raw Fury is a (un)publisher. We don’t care about genres or mechanics. We care about experiences and emotions. And we want to help developers make magic. 

Webpage: https://rawfury.com/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RawFury
